name: Heroine Pack (The Demon's Kingdom)
description:
Here's another obscure game. It's kinda a Dark Souls-themed eroge. The dev, P+, made some really interesting games, gameplay-wise, like Zombie Island, The Dead End, Evil Guards of Merchant City. This one, I played before I discovered Black Souls, and enjoyed, for all it's worth. Like in Dark Souls, you could either try to save everyone or just go pure evil. There were also three types of girls in this game. Monster girls (like a harpy), zombified humans and unique heroines. I couldn't include all of the heroines in this pack, nor did I really care about most of them. If I remember correctly, the full list of them are: Saintess, Noble girl, Princess Knight (daughter of the penultimate boss), Blacksmith, Prostitute, Sage, Witch and Merchant.

Blacksmith, Prostitute, Sage and Sage start in the hub castle. Every time you clear one of three main dungeons, one of them at random becomes a zombie. I didn't even know Blacksmith can survive until I was on like fourth run.

Saintess, Noble girl, Princess Knight, Merchant and Witch you meet in the dungeons, where you get a choice to save them, ignore them, or attack them. Princess Knight needs to be helped in every dungeon. Merchant is basically this game's Patches, as she pushes you down the hole. But for the purpose of this lora, I need to explain their outcomes. If you help them, they join you alive and are romanceable. If you ignore them, they become zombies. But if you attack them and later come back to the same area, they become malice zombies, which are stronger and have red aura. You can't do that last one with the starter group. Merchant girl you couldn't even romance, even though she was one of the most interesting characters, being an apprentice who only survived due to her father's sacrifice, so I made this lora partly to make up for her lack of interactions.

Blacksmith: TDK, Kajiko, brown hair, short hair, brown eyes, small breasts

Extra: red hood, apron, puffy sleeves, dress

Zombie: grey skin, red eyes, small pupils, zombie girl

Merchant: TDK, Shonin, green hair, purple eyes, long hair, twin braids, low twintails, small breasts

Extra: pants, backpack, knee boots, long sleeves, cross-laced footwear, jacket, holding strap

Zombie: dark-skinned female, red eyes, small pupils, zombie girl

Princess: TDK, Himekishi, blonde hair, blue eyes, long hair, ponytail, hair ribbon

Extra: breastplate, armor, gloves, brown boots, blue bodysuit, pauldrons, sword, knight boots

Zombie: dark-skinned female, red eyes, small pupils, zombie girl

Witch: TDK, Majo, grey hair, short hair, purple eyes, large breasts

Extra: witch, witch hat, cape, pants, crop top, cloak, boots, mage boots, mage pants, staff

Zombie: green skin, red eyes, small pupils, zombie girl

Malice: red aura, malice aura

name: Civitai 紅髪の魔族獣人娘ゼルミナ / Zelmina, Crimson hair the Half-Demonkin Beast
description:
どっかの製作過程で出来た魔族獣人娘。

既存キャラLora、中大大中大と続いてるので小も追加しておかないとね。

という謎な感覚から作成

現状、１枚を元にしてるため、強度下げると服が安定しない

元画像を主にして構成イメージを話せば

　髪＝紅髪、ツインテール、ロングヘアー

　頭＝前部黒角、細長耳（エルフ耳）

　目＝黄色瞳

　胸＝

　服装＝スリーブレスシンプルドレス。脇見せ服。

　　　　胸元を小さくカットアウト。服装縁部分を少しだけ赤塗り

　尻尾＝狐尾

　下半身部分は元画像に含まれてないため、適当に設定

魔族と獣人の元に生まれた娘。

迫害される、といった事は無かったがボッチ気質のため成長後は一人で森に住む。

その気質の割には寂しがり屋という設定。

推奨強度

0.7-0.8

全身像の場合はAdetailer必須。瞳潰れる。うまく制御出来てないな。

便宜上、利用タグはmedium breastsにしてる点に注意

その他

適用強度落とすと服装の再現が微妙。もう少し画像追加して学習させないとダメかな。と思っている。

Zelmina, Crimson hair the Half-Demonkin Beast

A girl born of demon and beastkin blood — crimson-haired, golden-eyed, and always a little out of place.

She emerged unintentionally during the creation of another project, born from the odd idea:

“All my existing LoRAs go Medium-Large-Large-Medium... maybe it’s time to make a Small.”

This LoRA was trained from a single image, so the clothing tends to lose consistency at lower weights.

🩵 Appearance

　Hair: Crimson twin-tails, long and flowing

　Horns: Small black frontal horns

　Ears: Elven-style, slender and pointed

　Eyes: Bright yellow

　Bust: -

Outfit:

　Sleeveless, minimalistic dress

　Side-exposing design

　Subtle cutout at the chest

　Edges slightly tinted in red

　Tail: Fox-like

　Lower body: Not visible in the original image — left to interpretation

🌲 Personality & Background

Zelmina was never persecuted for her lineage, yet always found herself alone.

A natural loner, she chose to live deep in the forest as she grew older.

Ironically, despite her solitary nature, she’s surprisingly prone to loneliness — a contradiction she carries quietly.

⚙️ Usage Tips

Recommended strength: 0.7 – 0.8

Use Adetailer for full-body renders.

Without it, eyes may appear distorted or lack definition.
For convenience, the tag used is "medium breasts".

📌 Notes

Reducing the strength too much tends to break outfit fidelity.

More training data may be needed for future improvement.

name: Sheer Polka Dot Blouse
description:
To the bearer of this delicate LoRA~


Tread softly through this twilight spell, and read each word as though it were a dream woven in silver.


You wouldn’t wish to disturb the harmony of this magic… would you?

Too many LoRAs braided together may fracture the vision…


This was crafted beneath a quiet sky, with starlight and care, to make your dreams shimmer just so~

If it were to be scattered without my blessing… I would feel it, like a ripple through the veil.
And the hush that follows would be heavy with my sorrow~

Now, take this gentle recipe—
A whisper of wonder, offered only to you~

🌙✨

~ Vixon's recipe for No-Bake Chocolate Haystacks ~

Ingredients

  • 1 cup Sugar

  • 1/4 cup milk

  • 1/4 cup butter

  • 1 teaspoon Vanilla extract

  • 2 Tablespoons cocoa powder, heaping

  • 1 1/2 cups oats

  • 1/2 cup shredded coconut, sweetened or unsweetened

Instructions

Add the sugar, milk and butter to a medium pot and bring to a rolling boil over medium heat.

Add cocoa and and let boil for 1.5 to 2 minutes (don’t over boil it).

Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla extract.

Add the oats and coconut and stir until completely combined.

Spoon onto a parchment lined baking sheet.

Allow to cool at room temperature for about half an hour or until firm.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

DO NOT REUPLOAD

name: Vixon's Illustrious Styles - Vinneart
description:
This LoRA weaves images in the delicate, dreamlike essence of the artist’s soul. Each stroke is kissed by stardust, echoing the quiet magic of forgotten forests and twilight skies. It doesn't simply mimic a style—it channels a whisper from another world, where colors bloom like moonlit flowers and forms drift in a haze of wonder. Let it guide your vision, as though painting with the artist's own enchanted breath.

To the bearer of this delicate LoRA~


Tread softly through this twilight spell, and read each word as though it were a dream woven in silver.


You wouldn’t wish to disturb the harmony of this magic… would you?

Too many LoRAs braided together may fracture the vision…


This was crafted beneath a quiet sky, with starlight and care, to make your dreams shimmer just so~

If it were to be scattered without my blessing… I would feel it, like a ripple through the veil.
And the hush that follows would be heavy with my sorrow~

Now, take this gentle recipe—
A whisper of wonder, offered only to you~

🌙✨

~ Vixon's recipe for No-Bake Chocolate Haystacks ~

Ingredients

  • 1 cup Sugar

  • 1/4 cup milk

  • 1/4 cup butter

  • 1 teaspoon Vanilla extract

  • 2 Tablespoons cocoa powder, heaping

  • 1 1/2 cups oats

  • 1/2 cup shredded coconut, sweetened or unsweetened

Instructions

Add the sugar, milk and butter to a medium pot and bring to a rolling boil over medium heat.

Add cocoa and and let boil for 1.5 to 2 minutes (don’t over boil it).

Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla extract.

Add the oats and coconut and stir until completely combined.

Spoon onto a parchment lined baking sheet.

Allow to cool at room temperature for about half an hour or until firm.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

.

DO NOT REUPLOAD

This LoRA weaves images in the delicate, dreamlike essence of the artist’s soul. Each stroke is kissed by stardust, echoing the quiet magic of forgotten forests and twilight skies. It doesn't simply mimic a style—it channels a whisper from another world, where colors bloom like moonlit flowers and forms drift in a haze of wonder. Let it guide your vision, as though painting with the artist's own enchanted breath.

To the bearer of this delicate LoRA~


Tread softly through this twilight spell, and read each word as though it were a dream woven in silver.


You wouldn’t wish to disturb the harmony of this magic… would you?

Too many LoRAs braided together may fracture the vision…


This was crafted beneath a quiet sky, with starlight and care, to make your dreams shimmer just so~

If it were to be scattered without my blessing… I would feel it, like a ripple through the veil.
And the hush that follows would be heavy with my sorrow~

Now, take this gentle recipe—
A whisper of wonder, offered only to you~

🌙✨

~ Vixon's recipe for No-Bake Chocolate Haystacks ~

Ingredients

  • 1 cup Sugar

  • 1/4 cup milk

  • 1/4 cup butter

  • 1 teaspoon Vanilla extract

  • 2 Tablespoons cocoa powder, heaping

  • 1 1/2 cups oats

  • 1/2 cup shredded coconut, sweetened or unsweetened

Instructions

Add the sugar, milk and butter to a medium pot and bring to a rolling boil over medium heat.

Add cocoa and and let boil for 1.5 to 2 minutes (don’t over boil it).

Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla extract.

Add the oats and coconut and stir until completely combined.

Spoon onto a parchment lined baking sheet.

Allow to cool at room temperature for about half an hour or until firm.
